Finding the rule for a linear function when given a table - How to solve math problems

\begin{aligned}\n&\text { an }\\\n&\begin{array}{|c|c|}\n\hline x & f(x) \\\n\hline-1 & -7 \\\n\hline 0 & 0 \\\n\hline 1 & 7 \\\n\hline 2 & 14 \\\n\hline\n\end{array}\n\end{aligned}[imath]\hline x & f(x) [/imath] [imath]\hline-1 & -7 [/imath] [imath]\hline 0 & 0 [/imath] [imath]\hline 1 & 7 [/imath] [imath]\hline 2 & 14 [/imath] [imath]\hline[/imath]
